column4: All of ATI cards are wrong cards. They are garbage. Waste of money.
Doesn't matter which one I buy. 3850, 3870, 2900, 2600, 1950, they all suck compared to Nvidia in quality, drivers, support, warranty and pricing.
sounds like a strong opinion, yes, but a bit thin on facts.  nm though, if it's a personal preference issue, stick with it.
It's fact that ATI drivers suck. It's fact that on the high end, Nvidia is better. The only thing ATI cards are good for is for watching HD movies on WINDOWS.
